and d.code like concat('%', #{publishPlan.deviceCode}, "%")

mapper.insert:
select uuid() from dual
insert into t_publish_plan(id,customer_id, name, type, group_name, version_id, version_name, resource_id, resource_name, area, show_type, start_time, end_time, stay_time, des, create_time) values(#{id}, #{customerId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{groupName}, #{versionId}, #{versionName}, #{resourceId}, #{resourceName}, #{area}, #{showType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{stayTime}, #{des}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: update t_publish_plan set name=#{name}, type = #{type}, group_name = #{groupName}, version_id = #{versionId}, version_name = #{versionName}, resource_id = #{resourceId}, resource_name = #{resourceName}, area = #{area}, show_type = #{showType}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, stay_time = #{stayTime}, des = #{des} where id = #{id}
update t_publish_plan set dev_count=#{devCount}, finish_count = #{finishCount}, not_finish_count = #{notFinishCount} where id = #{id}
update t_publish_plan set finish_count = finish_count + 1, not_finish_count = not_finish_count - 1 where id = (select pub_plan_id from t_device_resource where id = #{pubId})
update t_publish_plan set status = 'N' where id = #{id}
update t_publish_plan set status = 'Y' where id = #{id}
update t_publish_plan set check_status = #{checkStatus} where id = #{id}
update t_publish_plan set check_status = 'finish' where not_finish_count = 0 and id = (select pub_plan_id from t_device_resource where id = #{pubId})
